comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Other members of the convention of California Shriners visiting New York City on May 8, 1914 (no connection with the funeral of General Dan Sickles, another event that took place in NYC on that day):

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5415570427/in/photostream/]

The California Shriners gave a concert in NYC's City Hall Park:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5209399484/]

Rain dampened the Shriners' concert that day:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5208801667/in/photostream/]
